attributes.action: Stop football and GAA tops in a sheard space in Craigavon lakes leisure centre
attributes.additional_details: By placing sign show that they can't be wearing this type of tops in this area it is a sheard space respect each other
attributes.background: To stop people from making the unionist community feeling welcome at there local leisure centre by banning football and GAA tops

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We also can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the rules put in place at leisure centres.
